div.p: Milford Schools are closed. Visit our Extended School Closure Information Hub for the latest updates.

div.a: Click To View All News Articles

h3.a: MHS Students Sing for Children's Hospital Video

div.p: PROUD MILFORD MOMENT! This is AWESOME - check it out! Milford High School was set to perform “High School Musical Junior” as their spring play, but the COVID-19 shut down canceled the show. Cincinnati Children's Medical Center reached out and

h3.a: Schools Closed for Rest of School Year

div.p: Ohio Governor DeWine announced the closure of all schools through the end of the school year. Remote learning will continue. The last day of remote learning for preschool through 11th grade students will be May 28. We know the Governor’s order to close schools for an even longer period of time presents a challenge for our families. Although our buildings will remain closed, learning will continue. Our teachers will continue to communicate with students. Superintendent Nancy House expresses her sincere appreciation to all of our Milford families and all of our teachers and staff for their diligent, hard work since we initially closed our school buildings last month. We appreciate everyone's flexibility during this time.

h3.a: Info about Graduation: Virtual & Formal Ceremonies planned

div.p: Unfortunately we had to cancel our in-person commencement ceremony for Milford High School's Class of 2020 that was scheduled for May 23 at the Cintas Center on the campus of Xavier University. Cintas Center is closed through July 31. While not ideal, and

h3.a: Your teachers miss you, Milford Eagles!

div.p: We're back from Spring Break and this is week four of distance learning for our Milford Eagles. Your teachers miss you so much. Head over to our Facebook page to watch a special video. WINGS UP!

h3.a: Virtual Board of Education Meeting April 16 @ 7:00 p.m.

div.p: Tomorrow evening the Board of Education will meet for their regularly scheduled April meeting. They'll meet virtually at 7:00 p.m. The meeting may be viewed live the following ways: ICRC-TV's direct stream link - or - ICRC-TV's Milford Schools' page - or - on TV on Spectrum Cable Channel 15 and on Cincinnati Bell Fioptics Channel 845.
WELCOME BACK EAGLES! Today, April 14, students return from spring break to at-home learning. This is week four of distance learning.
